newsitem.title: FINLAND: Technical data problems at Helsinki stock exchange.
newsitem.headline: Technical data problems at Helsinki stock exchange.

text.p: A technical problem at the Helsinki Stock Exchange was delaying distribution of trading data from the bourse on Wednesday, but the brokers' HETI system and trading were not affected, a bourse official said.
He could not say when the problem would be solved.
He said the HEX index was up 0.76 percent at 1130/0930 GMT.
